articles.author: Jessie Yeung and Kathleen Magramo, CNN
articles.title: 7.0-magnitude earthquake kills five, injures 130 in northern Philippines - CNN
articles.description: At least five people died and 130 others were injured after a powerful earthquake struck the northern Philippines on Wednesday, according to authorities in the Southeast Asian country.
